transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji madam.
Executive: Hello, Kavita bol rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji good afternoon. Kavita ji bol rahe hain.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Yes sir. Last time se price. Yes sir aapki baat ho gayi hogi jo mere senior hain unse.
Executive: Ji Kavita ji Kavita ji bol rahi hai kya?
Executive: Ji sir main Kavita baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan madam baat to hui bas wo to wohi baat keh rahe hain na wo sir to maine unhe bola acha sir kehna ka sir agar aapki payment ka hisab hota to main karwa deta char mahine ho gaye aapko. Ji sir aapki jo aapki jo madam de rakhi hai agar aap kaho to main change kar sakta hu magar ye Kavita Kavita ji bhi bahut achi hai meri inse baat ho rakhi hai magar aisi baat nahi jo mujhe manager mile wo to bahut ache hain isme koi dikkat nahi hai main inke liye nahi keh raha hu magar mere sath to jo mere pass aaye the ladka Nalesh sir usne mere sath fraud kiya hai magar wo to bache bahut ache hain main kaha bhai unki to koi galti nahi hai. Baki hai ki dekho mere pass na abhi 10-12 product aur hai main dekho ladki ke liye bhi dekh raha hu apply kar diya maine ab main dekhta hu ladki ke liye job ke liye wo bhi ke liye uthayegi.
Executive: Okay. Ji sir. Main soch raha hu jab wo payment payment ka to requirement ho nahi raha baki main koshish karta hu char panch panch saat hazaar rupay mahine ke liye ladki rakhunga fir wo use handle karna grahak. Ji sir bilkul. Aur mere 10-12 10-12 haan ji. Ji sir boliye. 20000 chal rahi hai iski.
Customer: 10-12 product mere launch hue hai abhi wo bhi wo bhi aap dal lena fir main whatsapp kar dunga aapke pass karna hai kiske pass karna hai bataiye.
Executive: Yes sir aap mere ko whatsapp kar dijiyega main add kar dungi jab koi jaise ki aapne bataya aap ek jo hai ek person assign karenge to us person ka bhi bata dijiyega mere ko main ek bar unko bata dungi service wagera kaise use karni hai aur buylead wagera ka bhi main bata dungi.
Customer: Baki madam aisa hai aap na koshish karo buylead aisi utha kar ke bhejo jisse ki main handle kar saku. Wo to ladki jab rakhi jayegi rakhi jayegi baki hai ki mere panch saat hazaar ke mahine ka kharcha aur badha diya aap logo ne. Baki main koshish kar raha hu ke aap log na aisa kar lo mujhe buylead achi si utha kar ke bhejo aap main usko call kar sakta hu. Mera sahyog karo thoda sa mujhe bhi achi khushi mile aap logo se.
Executive: Hello. Okay. Yes sir main aisa karungi aapko kuch buylead jo hai whatsapp kar diya karungi ki so that jitna sir aapne invest kiya utna to aapko matlab return nikal hi jayega isse. Thik hai na. Chalo thik hai madam thik hai madam. Baki kal main usko ja kar ke aapko ji bataiye. Ji sir aap jo hai aap bol rahe the kuch aapke jo product hai wo matlab abhi launch hue hain to matlab wo aap kab tak share karenge aap ye bata dijiye. Kal kal kal share kar dunga ab to office se nikal gaya na main. Okay abhi aap office se nikalte hain thik hai acha jo aap deal karte hain pan india deal ke aapko jo hai buyleads chahiye right. Ji right sir. Aap jo buyleads jo aapko buyleads chahiye jo main aapko share karungi pan india level pe deal karte hain aap right. Acha. Nahi sir main puch rahi hu aap se aapko kis kis location ki buyleads chahiye main ye janna chah rahi hu. Main us location ki aapko share kar dungi. Jaise main aapko keh raha hu mujhe all india kahengi to buyleads do koi aisi baat nahi hai agar aap local ki dete ho jaise mujhe upar nagar ho gaya merath ho gaya delhi ho gaya aap idhar ke ilake ke dete ho to ye to hamare pass padte hain yahan se 100-150 kilometer 400 kilometer ke beech mein hota hai. Okay. Baki mere pass main na odisha se buylead uthai thi maine jab odisha se buylead uthai to wo odisha se walo ka mera unse rate nahi ban paya man liya wo oily hame keh raha hai ki 30 rupay ka saman deta are bhai 30 rupay ka do maine aapko samjhaya tha aise thodi hota hai. Bhai agar ek product pe kam se kam char panch rupay do rupay teen rupay bacha aur wo product thok mein de raha hai to koi dikkat nahi agar hazaar 500 piece le raha hai to isme koi baat nahi agar chalo panch saat hazaar rupay bach rahe hain chalo bhai de dete hain. Baki aap buylead mujhe aap bhejo chahe aap all india mein kahin ki bhi ho koi dikkat nahi. Aur buylead ka maine bataya ko aapko 10 hazaar se lekar ke unhone 50 hazaar ki buylead kaha tha ki 50 wali uthana main keh raha hu 10 wali 20 wali 30 wali 50 wali lakh wali jo bhi buylead de sakte ho de do aap. Main uske liye tayar hu chahe 10 hazaar wali buylead ho thik hai madam. Sir yes sir bilkul main aapko share kar dungi buylead uska koi issue nahi rahega thik hai sir aapka jo yahan se jo aapka jo concern raise hua tha wo main close kar du aapka aapki baat to ho hi gayi hai sir se. Haan wo to sir se to baat hi ho gayi sir to ye keh rahe hain ki bhai payment to aapko requirement to waise to refund ho sakta hai. Yes sir bilkul sir bilkul sir agar sir agar hum hand mein agar hota na to ye bataiye ki hum kyu nahi karte aapko refund. Baki aise unhone me bola ke bhai aap aap hamara sath doge to aap hamara sath do to isko main koshish karta hu chalo aur kya hoga. Yes sir. Thik hai madam. Yes sir bilkul aur sir main yahan se aapka concern close kar rahi hu aap na abhi call pe rahiyega. Aap na abhi jo hai call pe rahiyega aapko jo hai mail aayega aap us pe sir jo hai us pe jo hai sir us pe jo hai aap konsa note le lo. Hello. Chalo main abhi abhi main safar mein hu main main baat. Sir wo to thik hai abhi sir aapka sir one second aapka na yahan se concern close hua hai mail pe jo hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants good quality buyleads.

- Payment refund is pending.

- Wants to assign a person for IndiaMART work.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to provide good quality buyleads.

- Executive assured to share updates via WhatsApp.

- Executive will close the concern raised.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a mail regarding concern closure.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, payment, products, support
